og.description:
Oklahoma Sen. Jim Inhofe endorsed Florida Sen. Marco Rubio for the Republican presidential nomination on Saturday, The Oklahoman reports.
Calling Rubio  a solid conservative,  Inhofe added,  Marco and I have shared, similar values, such as working for a smaller federal...
